attributes.action: Income tax at 90% for earning more than 52x the minimum wage. Even if you live abroad
attributes.additional_details:
Income tax rate of 90% on salaries higher than 52 x the minimum wage.
At current rates this is about £650,000 p/a. If you want more – raise the minimum wage! While there are people who think one of their years is worth more than another man's whole life we will never be “All in this together”
This tax rate to apply to UK citizens – wherever they are.
This can pay for the NHS treatment you will come back for if needed and the diplomats and soldiers who will get you out when the killing starts where you are.

For more info see http://www.secondthoughtfortheday.co.uk/6634/
